attributes.action: Cancel GCSE’s and A Level’s in 2021 and replace with teacher assessment.
attributes.additional_details: The lack of time being in school throughout the previous academic year, and currently this academic year, has lead to a lot of stress for students. It has also caused a huge disadvantage for students as they are missing out on important teaching time with a teacher to help and answer students questions. This means students have struggled to understand topics and information that they are expected to know. A majority of students have spent time isolating, causing more time off missing learning time.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSE’s and A Level’s for year 11 and 13 students in 2021 and replace using teacher assessment, with the use of school work throughout the school year and also the use of course work.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Prime Minister has stated that it is not possible or fair for all exams to go ahead this summer as normal: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021

The Education Secretary has subsequently said that this year the Government will "put our trust in teachers rather than algorithms": https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2021-01-06/debates/D2A64DD9-6A6B-4EAB-8001-C3BACDE25B02/Covid-19EducationalSettings

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564696
